article.headline: Nicholls State 82, Texas State 67
article.story: THIBODAUX, La. (AP) -- Adonis Gray had 22 points and seven rebounds as Nicholls State defeated Texas State Saturday 82-67. Stefan Blaszczynski and James Dixon each scored 15 at Nicholls State improved to 3-15 (2-2 Southland Conference). Blaszczynski also had a game-high 10 rebounds. Texas State held a narrow lead heading into halftime, 40-37, as both teams shot under 50 percent from the field. But Texas State faltered in the second, shooting just 28 percent, while Nicholls State shot nearly 78 percent. Texas State (7-10, 2-2 Southland Conference) attempted 33 3-pointers and only made 9, with Matt Fullenwider connecting on three of his four attempts. He ended the day with 12 points. Dylan Moseley led Texas State with 14 points.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
